summary: Jimmy goes to work with his uncle, the owner of a food factory. Before he gets there, he befriends an Irish family who happens to be his uncle's worst enemy because of their love for music and in-house band who constantly practices.
cast: James Stewart|Paulette Goddard|Horace Heidt|Charles Winninger|Mary Gordon|Frank Melton|Jed Prouty|Charles Arnt|Dick Hogan|James Burke|Donna Wood|Larry Cotton|Beverly Andre|Herbert Ashley|Bobby Barber|Harry Bowen|Aldrich Bowker|Ed Brady|Frankie Carle|Art Carney|Virginia Carroll|Ken Christy|Dolores Dean|Edgar Dearing|Dick Dennis|Abe Dinovitch|Evelyn Dockson|Fern Emmett|Carlos Fernando|James Flavin|John Frank|Jody Gilbert|William Gould|Eddie Gribbon|Paul Gustine|Chuck Hamilton|Ray Hanson|John Holland|Bud Jamison|Roy Lester|Charles McAvoy|Jewel McGowan|Howard M. title: El arca de oro
